1286030.name: Mad Bulldozer
1286030.description:
Hello, everyone,I'm glad to introduce our new game now:Mad Bulldozer.
In the game, all kinds of bulldozers can spray flame, avoid or use varieties of props, and run crazily on the floating island of the mines.
The player can control the bulldozer and knock the opponent down the floating island through collision, he will become more powerful every time he succeeds.
You can customize your character and fight local enemies or fight with friends.The game supports 1-8 players (The multiplayer mode must have handle support, and the native game supports Xbox and PS4 handles).
1286030.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 俄语, 日语, 简体中文, 繁体中文, 阿拉伯语, 韩语, 土耳其语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 泰语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 越南语, 丹麦语, 乌克兰语, 保加利亚语, 匈牙利语, 希腊语, 挪威语, 捷克语, 波兰语, 瑞典语, 罗马尼亚语, 芬兰语, 荷兰语, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲
